textBeforeTable: Recent topics in "Kombucha Tea" join to post I wouldn't worry about it. I've left my scoby in a ziplock bag in the fridge once or twice. ^^ Fri, August 1, 2008 - 11:02 AM Re: Storing scoby? 4 Annie join to post For example, at the moment you're reading this it's very likely you're wearing clothing, siting on furniture or touching at least a dozen different kinds of plastic. The inhaled out-gassing from the hot plastic casing of your computer likely has far worse outcomes than those from two weeks of your culture stored in a plastic container. But you gotta make a reasonably conscious decision in there somewhere, no? Essentially, we're talkin best practices and mindfulness here, not absolutes.
